title: "Optus to unleash in-call translator on some postpaid customers"
excerpt: "Optus is set to unleash onto the public an in-call translation service powered by Google technology that can translate between languages in real-time. CEO Kelly Bayer Rosmarin told the CommsDay Summit that the telco is taking expressions of interest from postpaid customers that want to trial the service."
